attributes.action: close this website as the government clearly ignore the results!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all of the major petitions that I have seen on this site, were the public have voted against a government policy, the reply from the government is one of ignorance.  This petition site is a complete waste of time and public money.

rejection.details: If you have any comments about the e-petitioning system, please e-mail team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
